gewunu sathiye janathawa asuwe dutuwe rajaye ek niyojithayeku kumana ho pa්rakashayak kala wita eeta hathpasinma wenas deyak rajayema thawath niyojithayeku pawasa sitina aakarayayi.andamandawa sitina janathawatada,waradakaruwanta daduwam denawa yayi pawasamin rajaya wiruddha adahas darannawunwa dadayam karamin sitinawayayi chodana karamina sitina wipakshayatada madiwa rajaya koheyamin sitinawadayi danna kenek natha.nagena chodana walata pilithuru dimata ho rajayema atham pudgalayinge pa්rakashayan nisa janathawa athara athiwa thibena wyakula swabhawaya samanaya kirima ho rajaya nisi ki්rayamargayak gena athi bawakda penennata natha.yahapalanaya me yamin sitinne koyibatada?
aa wagema balaporoththu gonnak sithe guli karagena.

mema dadi uthsahaya malpalaganwamin 1946 agosthu 5wanidina, enam ohuge 16wani upandinayedi nil aamstron siya guwanyana padawime balapathraya labagaththe siyalu wibhaga ha prayogika parikshanawalin ihalinma samathwemini.
ee deta sadacharathmakawa owungen labena namyashilithwayata garu karanawa.
hima amma saha thawath katha
me dinawala ehi rugatha kirim siduwenawa.
me aya lipi kiyawana neme balana aya.
shishya wishishta winodaswadaya’ wruththiya samithi sathiye sama rathriyakama.
menna me widihatayi.
ee kawadakawath api denna thaniyama kochchiyaka eka langin wadiwela gihin nathi nisa.
dala deshiya nishpadithaya yanu wasaraka kalayak thula rataka nishpadanaya wana bhanda ha sewa wala mul yamaya watinakamayi.
sachethinakaye nimawa aarambhaya sita handuna gatha haki we.
meka udu yatikuru karanna nayakathwaya ganna kiyala mama oben illa sitinawa.
apita honda yaluwek innawa kiyala bharyawa ho mudal parissam kirima yaluwata denna honda na.
wu lokuma samagama rajayayi.
apa nam amudaya daka thibunu nisa etharam kuthuhalayak danune naha.
eeka pathulen udatama thalanawa.

”wel dan boyi…..mama danne na kohoma mekata oyata sthuthi karanna da kiyala…”
me pituwa anthimata sakasuwe 1 pebarawari 2014 dina di, 09:36 welawehidiya.
hada popiyana nawa yauwana aadara hangum….
ape ewun kagahanawa kristhiyani nikayawal walin minissu ee aagamata harogannawa kiyala.

rate jayaga්rahanaya sandaha ada athi ekama mawatha thoragena athi janathawata suba pathana bawath ee sandaha thamangen illa sitina bhumikawa itukirimata porondu wana bawath hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.
marunata passe ethana kisi kenek nane.

biyagullan niwatayan men mathru bhumiya pawa dimata sudanam nowana lesa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha eeye (25) daye dudaruwangen illa sitiyeya.ada ratata awashyawa aththe rata pawa nodena abhitha daru pirisak bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya kumana padawi thananthara daruwath gamath ratath amathaka nokala yuthu bawa awadharanaya kaleya.samaharun nusudusukamak lesa sithuwath thama upan gama madamulana yayi kimata thama kisiwiteka nopakilena bawa awadharanaya kala janadhipathiwaraya lowa kothanakata giyath upan gama, rata tharam watina kisiwak nathi bawa da pawasiya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha mese prakasha kale kolambaa, dewi balika widyalaye warshika thyaga pradanothsawayata eeye (25) ekwemini.dewi balika widyalaye mahindodaya thakshana widyagaraya da janadhipathithumage athin mehi di wiwrutha kerunu athara pariganaka widyagarayakin, bhashagarayakin saha ganithagarayakin yana siyalu pahasukamwalin mema demahal godanangilla samanwithaya.athamun thanathuru balaporoththu wanne manthrikamata path wannatath pera sita bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya thama me gamana aawe jaya paradum, sira danduwam madin iwasiliwanthawa bawa prakasha kaleya.waraya, guwanthotupala, adhiwegi marga men asata nopenenunath adhyapana kshethraye dawantha diyunuwak labannata samathwa athi bawath pasugiya kalaya thula rajaya labu athi wishishtathama jayagrahanaya adhyapanaye labu diyunuwa bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.fes buk eke sitina nandunana mithuranta wada thamage mapiyan kerehi wishwasaya thabana lesath janadhipathiwaraya wadiduratath illa sitiyeya.adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha saha dabliw.
- oya aththa kiwwa kiyala mama eyalata kiyanakota

shri lankawe sancharaya kirima anathurudayaka bawata nikuth kara thibu anathuru angawim iwath kirimata amerikawa thiranaya kara thibe.shri lankawa thula yahapath wathawaranaya hata ganima ema anathuru angawim iwath kirimata hethu wi athi bawa amerikanu rajya departhamenthuwa niwedanayak nikuth karamin pawasayi.ratathula pawathi yudhamaya wathawaranaya pasugiya wasare nimawimath samaga shri lankawe aarakshaka thaththwaya yahapath athata harimata hethuwi athi bawa amerikanu rajya departhamenthuwa kiya sitiyi.pasugiya wasare nowambar 19 wanida amerikawa mema anathuru angawima iwath kirimata thiranaya kaleya.

rajya paripalana ha swadesha katayuthu amathyanshaya saha jana ha sankhyalekhana departhamenthuwa eekabaddhawa sidu karana mema samikshanaya grama niladhari kottasa padanama matha kerena athara ganan ganime niladharin washayen grama niladharin path kirimata niyamithaya.grama sewa kottasa 14,021 ma aawaranaya wana se kerena samikshanayata niladharin 16,000 k yodawanu atha.ugath padam saha sanhindiya komisame nirdeshayan kriyathmaka kirima sandaha janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahathage pradhanathwayen path karana lada karya sadhaka kamituwa,wruththiya mattamin salasum karana samikshanayak mangin wipathata path pawul saha siwil wasiyange marana pilibandawa menma depala hani da aawaranaya wana paridden kala yuthu bawata nirdesha kara thibina..
